description: Chacra de d'Dago is a family-run coffee farm in Peru that practices biodynamic agriculture, emphasizing sustainability, spirituality, and self-sufficiency. Established in 2005, the farm integrates traditional farming methods with modern ecological practices, producing high-quality coffee while fostering biodiversity. The initiative aims to inspire other farms and promote responsible agricultural practices, contributing to a healthier food system. Chacra de d'Dago also collaborates with local farmers, enhancing community engagement and sustainability efforts.
name: Chacra de d'Dago
